content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"VII. Waivers and Amendments\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Any waiver of the provisions of this Code for executive officers or directors may only be granted by the Board of Directors or a standing committee of the Board and will be promptly disclosed to EPAM's shareholders. Any waiver of the provisions of this Code for other employees may only be granted by the Compliance Officer. Amendments to this Code must be approved by the Board of Directors, and will also be promptly disclosed to EPAM's shareholders.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
